name: qoder
title: Qoder
description: Quick access to Qoder AI Editor
author: ezreal09

commands.name: recent-projects
commands.title: Search Recent Projects
commands.subtitle: Qoder
commands.description: Search and open recent Qoder projects

commands.name: open-in-qoder
commands.title: Open in Qoder
commands.subtitle: Qoder
commands.description: Open current Finder selection in Qoder

commands.name: install-extension
commands.title: Install Extension
commands.subtitle: Qoder
commands.description: Install a Qoder extension by ID

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
